about_the_game:
Idle Bones Magic is an idler incremental game you play as a necromancer raising the dead and snowballing them into enormous hosts.

Go from a lowly initiate in the dark arts to a powerful necromancer taking over the world with hordes of countless zombies. You'll manage your resources to raise all sorts of creatures, which you'll put to work gathering more resources and attacking your enemies.

Start from animating bones into skeletal servants. Use them to pick up more bones to make more of themselves, then start exploring, expanding, and exploiting your surroundings. Shortly you'll be amassing thousands of zombies and taking over entire countries, learning how to create even more powerful creatures and indoctrinating more necromancers into your cult.

Unleash a zombie apocalypse on this unsuspecting world and watch your hordes multiply and take over everything.

content_descriptors.notes: The game is about killing or causing the death of large populations, but this is conveyed by numbers and no deaths are depicted on-screen.
